@roblox/globaltype/PlayerMouse.documentation: The PlayerMouse behaves identically to the Mouse object that is obtained using Tool.Equipped. It can be accessed from LocalScripts using the local player's Player:GetMouse method.
@roblox/globaltype/PlayerMouse.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer
local mouse = localPlayer:GetMouse()
    
mouse.Move:Connect(function()
	print("mouse screen position: ", mouse.X, mouse.Y)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Players.documentation: Un service de jeu qui contient desPlayer objets actuellement connectés.
@roblox/globaltype/Players.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function onCharacterAdded(character)
	-- Give them sparkles on their head if they don't have them yet
	if not character:FindFirstChild("Sparkles") then
		local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles")
		sparkles.Parent = character:WaitForChild("Head")
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- Check if they already spawned in
	if player.Character then
		onCharacterAdded(player.Character)
	end
	-- Listen for the player (re)spawning 
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterAdded)
end

-- Iterate over each player already connected
-- to the game using a generic for-loop
for i, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
-- Listen for newly connected players
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Players.BubbleChat.documentation: Indique si le chat en bulles est activé ou non. Il est défini avec le méthode Players:SetChatStyle.
@roblox/globaltype/Players.BubbleChat.code_sample:
local Players = game.Players

if (Players.ClassicChat and Players.BubbleChat) then
	print("Classic and Bubble chat are enabled!")
elseif (Players.ClassicChat) then
	print("Classic chat is enabled!")
elseif (Players.BubbleChat) then
	print("Bubble chat is enabled!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Players.ClassicChat.documentation: Indique si le chat classique est activé ou non ; défini par le méthode Players:SetChatStyle.

elseif (Players.BubbleChat) then

end

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.GetSetting.documentation:
Récupère une valeur précédemment stockéevalue avec la clé donnée, ou zéro si le paramètre
la clé donnée n'existe pas.
@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.GetSetting.code_sample:
local Plugin = PluginManager():CreatePlugin()
local RanBefore = Plugin:GetSetting("RanBefore")
Plugin:SetSetting("RanBefore", true)

if RanBefore then
	print("Welcome back!")
else
	print("Welcome! Thanks for installing this plugin!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.SetSetting.documentation:
Stocke un objet donnévalue pour une utilisation ultérieure sous la clé donnée. Lavalue volonté
persiste même après la fermeture du studio.
@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.SetSetting.code_sample:
local runBeforeKey = "RunBefore"
local hasRunBefore = plugin:GetSetting(runBeforeKey)

if hasRunBefore then
	print("Welcome back!")
else
	print("Welcome! Thanks for installing this plugin!")
	plugin:SetSetting(runBeforeKey, true)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.CreateDockWidg.documentation:
Un identifiant unique et cohérent utilisé pour stocker le dock du widget
état et autres détails internes.
Décrit le DockWidgetPlugingUI à créer (état initial, taille, etc.).

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.CreateDockWidg.code_sample:
-- Create new 'DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo' object
local widgetInfo = DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new(
	Enum.InitialDockState.Float,  -- Widget will be initialized in floating panel
	true,   -- Widget will be initially enabled
	false,  -- Don't override the previous enabled state
	200,    -- Default width of the floating window
	300,    -- Default height of the floating window
	150,    -- Minimum width of the floating window (optional)
	150     -- Minimum height of the floating window (optional)
)

-- Create new widget GUI
local testWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("TestWidget", widgetInfo)

local testButton = Instance.new("TextButton")
testButton.BorderSizePixel = 0
testButton.TextSize = 20
testButton.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1,0.2,0.4)
testButton.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5,0.5)
testButton.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,1,0)
testButton.Position = UDim2.new(0.5,0,0.5,0)
testButton.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeYY
testButton.Text = "Click Me"
testButton.Parent = testWidget

local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local widgetInfo = DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new(
	Enum.InitialDockState.Float,
	true, false, -- Enabled state, override
	200, 300,    -- Size
	150, 150     -- Minimum size
)

local testWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("TestWidget", widgetInfo)

function update()
	local v2 = testWidget:GetRelativeMousePosition()
	testWidget.Title = ("(%d, %d)"):format(v2.x, v2.y)
end
RunService.Stepped:connect(update)
update()

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.documentation: Contient le CFrame appliqué au Motor6D connecté à son BasePart. Celuipart qui est contrôlé dépendname de laPose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.CFrame.documentation: Ce cFrame s'applique au Motor6D correspondant au Pose lorsque le Motor6D \ Transform est modifié.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.AddSubPose/param.documentation: Contient le CFrame appliqué au Motor6D connecté à son BasePart. Celuipart qui est contrôlé dépendname de laPose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.AddSubPose.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local pose = Instance.new("Pose")
pose.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out
local pose2 = Instance.new("Pose")
pose2.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose2.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemovePose(pose) -- pose.Parent = nil 

wait(2)

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

pose:AddSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = pose

wait(2)

pose:RemoveSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.GetSubPoses/para.documentation: Contient le CFrame appliqué au Motor6D connecté à son BasePart. Celuipart qui est contrôlé dépendname de laPose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.GetSubPoses.documentation: Retourne un tableau contenant tous lesPose sous-qui ont été ajoutés à un objetPose`.
@roblox/globaltype/Pose.GetSubPoses.code_sample:
local function resetPoses(parent)
    	-- both functions are equivalent to GetChildren
    	local poses = parent:IsA("Keyframe") and parent:GetPoses() 
    		or parent:IsA("Pose") and parent:GetSubPoses()
    
    	for _, pose in pairs(poses) do 
    		if pose:IsA("Pose") then
    			pose.CFrame = CFrame.new()
    			-- recurse
    			resetPoses(pose)
    		end
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.RemoveSubPose/pa.documentation: Contient le CFrame appliqué au Motor6D connecté à son BasePart. Celuipart qui est contrôlé dépendname de laPose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.RemoveSubPose.documentation: Supprime unPose sous-duPoseen le mettant à zéro.
@roblox/globaltype/Pose.RemoveSubPose.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local pose = Instance.new("Pose")
pose.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out
local pose2 = Instance.new("Pose")
pose2.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose2.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemovePose(pose) -- pose.Parent = nil 

wait(2)

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

pose:AddSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = pose

wait(2)

pose:RemoveSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/ProximityPrompt.documentation: An object that allows developers to prompt users to interact with an object in the 3D world
@roblox/globaltype/ProximityPrompt.code_sample:
local proximityPrompt = script.Parent
local seat = proximityPrompt.Parent.Seat

seat:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Occupant"):Connect(function()
    if seat.Occupant then
        proximityPrompt.Enabled = false
    else
        proximityPrompt.Enabled = true
    end
end)

proximityPrompt.Triggered:Connect(function(player)
    seat:Sit(player.Character.Humanoid)
end)

Donne le thread actuel jusqu'à ce que le signal soit déclenché et renvoie les arguments

@roblox/globaltype/ProximityPrompt.Trigg.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local playersHealing = {}

RunService.Stepped:Connect(function(currentTime, deltaTime)
	for player, v in pairs(playersHealing) do
		local humanoid = player.Character:FindFirstChildWhichIsA("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health + 30*deltaTime
		end
	end
end)


script.Parent.Triggered:connect(function(player)
	playersHealing[player] = true
end)

script.Parent.TriggerEnded:connect(function(player)
	playersHealing[player] = nil
end)

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.GetPivot/p.documentation: Classe abstraite pour tous les objets ayant un emplacement physique dans le monde, spécifiquement BasePart et Model.

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.GetPivot.code_sample:
-- This code should be placed in a LocalScript under StarterPlayerScripts
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")

local function doTeleport()
	local player = Players.LocalPlayer
	local character = player.Character
	if character and character.Parent then
		-- Move the character 10 studs forwards in the direction they're facing
		local currentPivot = character:GetPivot()
		character:PivotTo(currentPivot * CFrame.new(0, 0, -10))
	end
end

ContextActionService:BindAction("Teleport", doTeleport, true, Enum.KeyCode.F)

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.PivotTo.code_sample:
-- This code should be placed in a LocalScript under StarterPlayerScripts
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")

local function doTeleport()
	local player = Players.LocalPlayer
	local character = player.Character
	if character and character.Parent then

		local currentPivot = character:GetPivot()
		character:PivotTo(currentPivot * CFrame.new(0, 0, -10))
	end
end

ContextActionService:BindAction("Teleport", doTeleport, true, Enum.KeyCode.F)

@roblox/globaltype/RayValue.documentation: Un objet conteneur pour un seul Ray.
@roblox/globaltype/RayValue.code_sample:
local partA = workspace.PartA
local partB = workspace.PartB

-- Construct the Ray object
local origin = partA.Position
local direction = partB.Position - partA.Position
local ray = Ray.new(origin, direction)

-- Construct a RayValue to hold our new Ray
local rayValue = Instance.new("RayValue")
rayValue.Value = ray
rayValue.Name = "PartA-to-PartB Ray"
rayValue.Parent = workspace

-- Raycast to find any parts in between PartA and PartB
local part = workspace:FindPartOnRay(ray)
if part then
	print("Hit part: " .. part:GetFullName())
else
	-- This ought to never happen, as our ray starts at PartA
	-- and points towards PartB, so we should always hit PartB
	-- or some other part.
	print("No part hit!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.documentation: Similar to BindableEvent, but allows crossing the client/server boundary.
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.code_sample:
-- LocalScript
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("CreatePartEvent")
 
createPartEvent:FireServer(BrickColor.Green(), Vector3.new(10, 20, 0))


-- ========================================


-- Script
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = Instance.new("RemoteEvent", ReplicatedStorage)
createPartEvent.Name = "CreatePartEvent"
 
local function onCreatePartFired(player, color, position)
	print(player.Name, "wants to create a part")
	local newPart = Instance.new("Part")
	newPart.BrickColor = color
	newPart.Position = position
	newPart.Parent = game.Workspace
end
 
createPartEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(onCreatePartFired)

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.documentation: Used to create in-game APIs that both the client and the server can use to communicate with each other.
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.code_sample:
-- In a server script
function RemoteFunction.OnServerInvoke(player, name)
	print("Hi, my name is", name, "and this invocation came from", player.Name)
	return player.Name
end

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.Invoke.documentation: Used to create in-game APIs that both the client and the server can use to communicate with each other.
The Player that the remote function is being fired to.
The arguments passed to the RemoteEvent.OnClientInvoke method.
Calls the method bound to the RemoteFunction by RemoteFunction.OnClientInvoke for the given Player. Use from a Script.
Used to create in-game APIs that both the client and the server can use to communicate with each other.
The arguments passed to the RemoteEvent.OnServerInvoke method.
Calls the method bound to the RemoteFunction by RemoteFunction.OnServerInvoke. Use from a LocalScript. Returns what RemoteFunction.OnServerInvoke returns.
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.Invoke.code_sample:
-- LocalScript
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local createPartRequest = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("CreatePartRequest")
 
local newPart = createPartRequest:InvokeServer()
print("The server created this part for me:", newPart)


-- ==================================================


-- Script
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local createPartRequest = Instance.new("RemoteFunction")
createPartRequest.Parent = ReplicatedStorage
createPartRequest.Name = "CreatePartRequest"
 
local function onCreatePartRequested(player)
	print(player.Name, "wants to create a new part")
	local newPart = Instance.new("Part")
	newPart.Parent = game.Workspace
	return newPart
end
 
createPartRequest.OnServerInvoke = onCreatePartRequested

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.OnClie.documentation: Correspond with the arguments passed by RemoteFunction:InvokeClient.

Called when the client is invoked by RemoteFunction:InvokeClient.

Called when the server is invoked by RemoteFunction:InvokeServer

@roblox/globaltype/ReplicatedFirst.documentation: A container whose contents are replicated to all clients (but not back to the server) first before anything else.
@roblox/globaltype/ReplicatedFirst.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedFirst = game:GetService("ReplicatedFirst")

local player = Players.LocalPlayer 
local playerGui = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

-- Create a basic loading screen
local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
screenGui.IgnoreGuiInset = true
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
textLabel.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0, 20, 40)
textLabel.Font = Enum.Font.GothamSemibold
textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
textLabel.Text = "Loading"
textLabel.TextSize = 28
textLabel.Parent = screenGui
-- Parent entire screen GUI to player GUI
screenGui.Parent = playerGui

-- Remove the default loading screen
ReplicatedFirst:RemoveDefaultLoadingScreen()

--wait(3)  -- Optionally force screen to appear for a minimum number of seconds
if not game:IsLoaded() then
	game.Loaded:Wait()
end
screenGui:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.documentation: Game service responsible for all run-time activity and progression of time
@roblox/globaltype/RunService.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local PART_START_POS = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local PART_SPEED = Vector3.new(10, 0, 0)

-- Create a Part with a BodyPosition
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.CFrame = CFrame.new(PART_START_POS)
local bp = Instance.new("BodyPosition")
bp.Parent = part
bp.Position = PART_START_POS
part.Parent = workspace

local function onStep(currentTime, deltaTime)
	-- Move the part the distance it is meant to move
	-- in the last `deltaTime` seconds
	bp.Position = bp.Position + PART_SPEED * deltaTime
	
	-- Here's the math behind this:
	-- speed = displacement / time
	-- displacement = speed * time
end

RunService.Stepped:Connect(onStep)

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.BindToRend.documentation: Game service responsible for all run-time activity and progression of time
The name parameter is a label for the binding, and can be used with RunService.Unbind if the binding is no longer needed

The priority of the binding is an integer, and determines when during the render step to call the custom function. The lower this number, the sooner the custom function will be called. If two bindings have the same priority the Roblox engine will randomly pick one to run first. The default Roblox control scripts run with these specific priorities: - Player Input: 100 - Camera Controls: 200 For convenience, the '''RenderPriority''' enum can be used to determine the integer value to set a binding. For example, to make a binding right before the default camera update, simply subtract 1 from the camera priority level.
Given a string name of a function and a priority, this method binds the function to RunService.RenderStepped

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.Heartbeat.documentation: Fires every frame after the physics simulation has completed
@roblox/globaltype/RunService.Heartbeat.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local loopCount = 5
local count = 0

local connection
function onHeartbeat(step)
    if count < loopCount then
        count = count + 1
        print("Time between each loop: " .. step)
    else
        connection:Disconnect()
    end
end
connection = RunService.Heartbeat:Connect(onHeartbeat)

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.RenderStep.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local guiObject = script.Parent

local degreesPerSecond = 180

local function onRenderStep(deltaTime)
	local deltaRotation = deltaTime * degreesPerSecond
	guiObject.Rotation = guiObject.Rotation + deltaRotation 
end
RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(onRenderStep)

@roblox/globaltype/Seat.documentation: A type of BasePart that characters can 'sit' in. When a character touches an enabled Seat object, it will be attached to the part by a Weld and the default character scripts will play a sitting animation.
@roblox/globaltype/Seat.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
    
    local seat = Instance.new("Seat")
    seat.Anchored = true 
    seat.Position = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)
    seat.Parent = workspace 
    
    local currentPlayer = nil
    
    seat:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Occupant"):Connect(function()
    	local humanoid = seat.Occupant 
    	if humanoid then 
    		local character = humanoid.Parent
    		local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character)
    		if player then 
    			print(player.Name.." has sat down")
    			currentPlayer = player
    			return
    		end	
    	end
    	if currentPlayer then 
    		print(currentPlayer.Name.." has got up")
    		currentPlayer = nil
    	end
    end)

@roblox/globaltype/Seat.Disabled.documentation: Whether or not the seat is usable. If set to true, the seat will act as a normal part.

@roblox/globaltype/Seat.Occupant.documentation: The humanoid that is sitting in the seat

@roblox/globaltype/Selection.documentation: The Selection service controls the Instances that are selected in Roblox Studio.
@roblox/globaltype/Selection.code_sample:
local Selection = game:GetService("Selection")

for _, object in pairs(Selection:Get()) do
	if object:IsA("BasePart") then
		object.CFrame = object.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi / 2, 0)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Shirt.documentation: Displays a Shirt texture from the Roblox website to display on a Humanoid rig
@roblox/globaltype/Shirt.code_sample:
local function replaceClothes(player)
    	local character = player.Character
    	if character then 
    		-- look for shirts / pants
    		local shirt = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Shirt")
    		local pants = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Pants")
    		-- create shirts / pants if they don't exist
    		if not shirt then 
    			shirt = Instance.new("Shirt", character)
    		end 
    		if not pants then 
    			pants = Instance.new("Pants", character)
     		end
    		-- reset shirt / pants content ids
    		shirt.ShirtTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83326831"
    		pants.PantsTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=10045638"
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/Shirt.ShirtTemplate.documentation: Determines the texture of the Shirt. The content ID link pointing to the shirt template hosted on the Roblox website.
@roblox/globaltype/Shirt.ShirtTemplate.code_sample:
local function replaceClothes(player)
    	local character = player.Character
    	if character then 
    		-- look for shirts / pants
    		local shirt = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Shirt")
    		local pants = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Pants")
    		-- create shirts / pants if they don't exist
    		if not shirt then 
    			shirt = Instance.new("Shirt", character)
    		end 
    		if not pants then 
    			pants = Instance.new("Pants", character)
     		end
    		-- reset shirt / pants content ids
    		shirt.ShirtTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83326831"
    		pants.PantsTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=10045638"
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/SkateboardPlatform.documentation:
ASkateboardPlatform peut être utilisé pour créer un skateboard. Quand les personnages obtiennent
sur un skateboard, ils y restent collés jusqu'à ce qu'ils appuient sur la touche d'échappement. Jusqu'au
puis, le personnage utilise des animations de skateboard et se déplace plus vite qu'un
personnage ambulant.

La direction du mouvement, liée aux touches A et D. Doit être 1 (droite), 0
(droit) ou -1 (gauche). Rafraîchit à 0 sauf s'il est constamment défini
Si c'est vrai, les roues ne rouleront pas sans intervention de l'utilisateur.

@roblox/globaltype/SkateboardPlatform.Th.documentation:
La direction du mouvement, liée aux touches W et S. Doit être un entier 1
(avant), 0 (nul) ou -1 (marche arrière). Rafraîchira à 0 sauf si
réglé en permanence.

@roblox/globaltype/Smoke.documentation: Un émetteur de particules avec l'esthétique visuelle de la fumée.
@roblox/globaltype/Smoke.code_sample:
local function recurseForFire(object)
	-- Check if we found a Fire object that has no Smoke
	if object:IsA("Fire") and not object.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Smoke") then
		-- Create a smoke effect for this fire
		local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke")
		smoke.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0)
		smoke.Opacity = 0.15
		smoke.RiseVelocity = 4
		smoke.Size = object.Size / 4
		smoke.Parent = object.Parent
	end
	-- Continue search for Fire objects
	for _, child in pairs(object:GetChildren()) do
		recurseForFire(child)
	end
end
recurseForFire(workspace)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.documentation: UnSound `est un objet qui émet du son. Les sons peuvent être placés dans unBasePartouAttachment` pour émettre un son depuis une position particulière dans un lieu ou monde, ou il peut être fixé ailleurs pour jouer le son à un volume constant dans tout l'endroit.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.code_sample:
-- create a part
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
part.Name = "MusicBox"
part.Parent = game.Workspace

-- create a sound
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", part)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.EmitterSize = 5 -- decrease the emitter size (for earlier volume drop off)
sound.Looped = true

-- create a click detector
local clickDetector = Instance.new("ClickDetector", part)
clickDetector.MouseClick:Connect(function()
	-- toggle the sound playing / not playing
	if not sound.IsPlaying then
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")	
		sound:Play()
	else
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")	
		sound:Stop()
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.EmitterSize.documentation: La distance minimale, en montants, à laquelle un Sound 3D (enfant direct d'un BasePart ou Attachment) commencera à s'atténuer (diminution du volume).

end)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsLoaded.documentation:
Cette propriété sera vraie lorsque leSound ``sera chargé depuis Roblox
serveurs et est prêt à jouer.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsLoaded.code_sample:
local function loadSound(sound)
	-- Has the sound already loaded?
	if not sound.IsLoaded then 
		-- if not, wait until it has been
		sound.Loaded:Wait()
	end
end
loadSound(Workspace.Sound)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPaused.documentation: Cette propriété en lecture seule retournera true lorsque leSound ``ne joue pas.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPaused.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.Looped = true

if not sound.isLoaded then
	sound.Loaded:wait()
end

sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Pause()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

wait(2)
sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Stop()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPlaying.documentation: Cette propriété en lecture seule retournera true lorsque leSound ``est en cours de lecture.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPlaying.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.Looped = true

if not sound.isLoaded then
	sound.Loaded:wait()
end

sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Pause()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

wait(2)
sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Stop()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Looped.documentation: Cela définit si le Sound se répète ou non une fois qu'il est terminé joue.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Looped.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)

	-- listen for new characters
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(character)
		-- wait for the head to be added
		local head = character:WaitForChild("Head")

		-- create a sound
		local sound = Instance.new("Sound", head)
		sound.Name = "TestSound"
		sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds/uuhhh.mp3" -- oof
	
		-- loop the sound
		sound.Looped = true
		
		-- listen for loops
		sound.DidLoop:Connect(function(soundId, numOfTimesLooped)
			print("oof! "..tostring(numOfTimesLooped))
		end)

		-- play the sound
		sound:Play()
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.MaxDistance.documentation: La distance maximale, en montants, entre l'auditeur d'un client et le Sound origine et je l'entends toujours. S'applique uniquement aux sons parentaux à une Part ou Attachment (sons 3D).

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.MinDistance.documentation: La distance minimale à laquelle unSound `(enfant direct) 3D d'unBasePartouAttachment`) commencera à s'atténuer. Effectivement, la taille de l'émetteur.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Pitch.documentation: Obsolète. Définit la hauteur et la rapidité d'unSound ` lorsqu'il est joué. Plus l'entier est élevé, plus leSound` est élevé et rapide.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlayOnRemove.documentation: Quand c'est vrai, leSound ` sera lu lorsqu'il sera retiré du jeu, par parentage duSound` ou de l'un de ses ancêtres à zéro.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlayOnRemove.code_sample:
-- create a sound
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.Name = "TestSound"
sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds/uuhhh.mp3" -- oof

-- set PlayOnRemove to true
sound.PlayOnRemove = true

wait(3)
-- destroy the sound
sound:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackLoudnes.documentation:
Un nombre compris entre 0 et 1000 indiquant le volume actuel duSound ``
lecture.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackSpeed.documentation:
Détermine la vitesse à laquelle unSound ``sera joué, avec des valeurs plus élevées
ce qui fait que le son est lu plus rapidement et à une hauteur plus élevée.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackSpeed.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true

sound:Play()
wait(10)
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 3 -- 3x faster
wait(5)
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 0.5 -- 2x slower
wait(5)
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 1 -- default

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Playing.documentation: Indique si le «Sound `est en cours de lecture.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Playing.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true

print("playing sound")
sound.Playing = true

wait(10)

print("stopping sound")
sound.Playing = false

wait(5)

sound.Playing = true
local timePosition = sound.TimePosition
print("resumed at time position: "..tostring(timePosition)) -- c. 10 seconds

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.RollOffMaxDista.documentation: La distance maximale, en montants, entre l'auditeur d'un client et le Sound origine et je l'entends toujours. S'applique uniquement aux sons parentaux à une Part ou Attachment (sons 3D).

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.RollOffMinDista.documentation: La distance minimale, en montants, à laquelle un Sound 3D (enfant direct d'un BasePart ou Attachment) commencera à s'atténuer (diminution du volume).

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.RollOffMode.documentation: Contrôle la façon dont le volume d'unSound ``3D (parent d'unBasePartouAttachment`) se comporte comme la distance entre l'auditeur et le son les changements de parents.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundGroup.documentation: Le SoundGroup qui est lié à ce Sound. Volume et effets sonores appliqué à ce groupe de sons passera sur le son. Un son ne peut être dans un groupe sonore à untime.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundGroup.code_sample:
local SoundService = game:GetService("SoundService")

-- create a sound group
local soundGroup = Instance.new("SoundGroup", SoundService)

-- create a sound
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 2
sound.SoundGroup = soundGroup

-- play the sound
sound:Play()

wait(10)

-- change the volume
soundGroup.Volume = 0.1 

wait(3)

-- return the volume
soundGroup.Volume = 0.5
 
wait(4)

-- add a sound effect
Instance.new("ReverbSoundEffect", soundGroup)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundId.documentation:
Cette propriété est l'ID de contenu du fichier audio d'un objetSound ``
associé à. Une fois qu'un son a été téléchargé sur Roblox, l'ID de contenu
se trouve dans l'URL du son téléchargé.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundId.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimeLength.documentation: La durée du Sound en secondes. Si leSound ``n'est pas chargé, ce valuesera égal à 0.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimeLength.code_sample:
local function playForDuration(sound, duration)
	if not sound.IsLoaded then
		sound.Loaded:wait()
	end
	local speed = sound.TimeLength / duration
	sound.PlaybackSpeed = speed 
	sound:Play()
end

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimePosition.documentation: Affiche la progression en secondes du Sound. Peut être modifié pour déplacer le position de lecture du Sound avant et pendant la lecture.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimePosition.code_sample:
-- create a sound
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"

-- set the sound to start at 30 seconds
sound.TimePosition = 30

-- play the sound
sound:Play()

wait(5)

-- jump forwards to 100 seconds
sound.TimePosition = 100

wait(5)

-- jump back to the start
sound.TimePosition = 0

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Volume.documentation: Le volume duSound ``. Peut être réglé entre 0 et 10. La valeur par défaut est 0,5.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Volume.code_sample:
-- create a sound
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 2

-- make the sound loud
sound.Volume = 2

-- play the sound
sound:Play()

wait(7)

-- make the sound quiet
sound.Volume = 0.2

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Pause/param/0.documentation: UnSound est un objet qui émet du son. Les sons peuvent être placés dans un</code>BasePart<code>ou</code>Attachment pour émettre un son depuis une position particulière dans un lieu ou monde, ou il peut être fixé ailleurs pour jouer le son à un volume constant dans tout l'endroit.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Pause.documentation: Définit Sound.Playing sur false. Cela interrompt la lecture du Sound si le son est en cours de lecture. Comme Sound.TimePosition n'est pas réinitialisé, lorsque le paramètre Sound`` reprend sa position précédente.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Play/param/0.documentation: UnSound est un objet qui émet du son. Les sons peuvent être placés dans un</code>BasePart<code>ou</code>Attachment pour émettre un son depuis une position particulière dans un lieu ou monde, ou il peut être fixé ailleurs pour jouer le son à un volume constant dans tout l'endroit.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Play.documentation: Joue leSound `. DéfinitSound.TimePositionsur la dernière valeurvalue définie par unScript(ou 0 s'il n'a pas été défini), puis définitSound.Playing` sur vrai.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Resume/param/0.documentation: UnSound est un objet qui émet du son. Les sons peuvent être placés dans un</code>BasePart<code>ou</code>Attachment pour émettre un son depuis une position particulière dans un lieu ou monde, ou il peut être fixé ailleurs pour jouer le son à un volume constant dans tout l'endroit.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Resume.documentation: Reprend le Sound. Définit Sound.Playing sur true. Ne change pas Sound.TimePosition et peut donc être utilisé pour reprendre la lecture d'un le son a cessé d'utiliser Sound:Pause.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Stop/param/0.documentation: UnSound est un objet qui émet du son. Les sons peuvent être placés dans un</code>BasePart<code>ou</code>Attachment pour émettre un son depuis une position particulière dans un lieu ou monde, ou il peut être fixé ailleurs pour jouer le son à un volume constant dans tout l'endroit.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Stop.documentation: Arrête leSound `. DéfinitSound.Playingsur false puis définitSound.TimePosition` à 0.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.pause/param/0.documentation: UnSound est un objet qui émet du son. Les sons peuvent être placés dans un</code>BasePart<code>ou</code>Attachment pour émettre un son depuis une position particulière dans un lieu ou monde, ou il peut être fixé ailleurs pour jouer le son à un volume constant dans tout l'endroit.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.play/param/0.documentation: UnSound est un objet qui émet du son. Les sons peuvent être placés dans un</code>BasePart<code>ou</code>Attachment pour émettre un son depuis une position particulière dans un lieu ou monde, ou il peut être fixé ailleurs pour jouer le son à un volume constant dans tout l'endroit.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.stop/param/0.documentation: UnSound est un objet qui émet du son. Les sons peuvent être placés dans un</code>BasePart<code>ou</code>Attachment pour émettre un son depuis une position particulière dans un lieu ou monde, ou il peut être fixé ailleurs pour jouer le son à un volume constant dans tout l'endroit.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.DidLoop.Connect.documentation: Objet qui exécute des fonctions connectées lors d'une occurrence spécifique.
Connecte la fonction donnée à l'événement et renvoie un RBXScriptConnection qui le représente.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.DidLoop.Wait.documentation:
Donne le thread actuel jusqu'à ce que le signal soit déclenché et renvoie les arguments
fourni par le signal.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.DidLoop.documentation:
Événement qui se déclenche chaque fois que leSound `` boucle. Retourne SoundID et
NumOfTimesLooped, donnant le ContentId du son et le nombre de
fois en boucle respectivement.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.DidLoop.code_sample:
local function loopNTimes(sound, numberOfLoops)
	if not sound.IsPlaying then
		sound.Looped = true
		local connection = nil
		connection = sound.DidLoop:Connect(function(soundId, numOfTimesLooped)
			print(numOfTimesLooped)
			if numOfTimesLooped >= numberOfLoops then
				-- disconnect the connection
				connection:Disconnect()
				-- stop the sound
				sound:Stop()
			end
		end)
		sound:Play()
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.Distance.documentation: Le nombre de goujons à considérer comme un mètre parSoundService lorsque calcul de l'atténuation du volume 3DSound`.

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.DopplerS.documentation:
Cette propriété détermine le degré de hauteur d'un son 3D qui varie en raison

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.RespectF.documentation: Définit si la lecture de Sound à partir d'un client sera répliquée sur le serveur.

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.RolloffS.documentation: Définit la rapidité avec laquelle le volume 3D Sound s'atténue ou s'éteint.

@roblox/globaltype/Sparkles.documentation: Un émetteur de particules avec l'esthétique visuelle des étincelles.
@roblox/globaltype/Sparkles.code_sample:
local Players = game.Players

local function onCharacterSpawned(character)
	local hrp = character:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart")
	-- Add sparkles that are colored to the player's torso color
	local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles")
	sparkles.Parent = hrp
	sparkles.SparkleColor = character:WaitForChild("Body Colors").TorsoColor.Color
	sparkles.Enabled = true
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterSpawned)
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnerService.documentation: An internal service that is responsible for the behavior or SpawnLocations. Its functionality is not accessible to developers.

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.documentation: SpawnLocation, or "spawns" determine where a Player respawns when they die. They can be configured to allow only certain players to use each spawn, using Team. They also control how ForceField are set up for newly-spawned players.

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.AllowTe.documentation: Allows a Player to join the team by touching the SpawnLocation. When set to true, if a Player character comes into contact with the SpawnLocation, the player's Player.TeamColor will be set to SpawnLocation.TeamColor.

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Duratio.documentation: The length of time, in seconds, that a ForceField will be applied to a Player character spawning at this SpawnLocation. If Duration is zero, the ForceField is never created, and it will not trigger the Instance.DescendantAdded or Instance.ChildAdded events.
@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Duratio.code_sample:
local spawnLocation = Instance.new("SpawnLocation", game.Workspace)
spawnLocation.Anchored = true
spawnLocation.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
spawnLocation.Neutral = true -- anyone can spawn here
spawnLocation.Duration = 20 -- ForceField duration 20s

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Enabled.documentation: Sets whether or not the SpawnLocation is enabled. When disabled players cannot spawn at the SpawnLocation and the AllowTeamChangeOnTouch functionality is disabled.
@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Enabled.code_sample:
local spawnLocation = Instance.new("SpawnLocation", game.Workspace)
spawnLocation.Anchored = true
spawnLocation.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
spawnLocation.Neutral = true -- anyone can spawn here
spawnLocation.Enabled = true

spawnLocation:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(function()
	spawnLocation.Transparency = spawnLocation.Enabled and 0 or 0.5
end)

wait(5)
spawnLocation.Enabled = false -- transparency = 0.5

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Neutral.documentation: Whether or not a SpawnLocation is affiliated with a specific team. This means that any Player, of any Team, can spawn on it if this property is set to true.

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.TeamCol.documentation: Sets what team the SpawnLocation is affiliated to. If SpawnLocation.Neutral property is false, only Players with the same Player.TeamColor as the spawn's TeamColor will be able to spawn there.

@roblox/globaltype/SpecialMesh.documentation: The SpecialMesh is an object that allows developers to provide a standard template or user uploaded mesh to a BasePart.

@roblox/globaltype/SpecialMesh.MeshType.documentation: Determines the type of mesh that will be applied to the BasePart the SpecialMesh is parented to.

@roblox/globaltype/SphereHandleAdornment.documentation: The SphereHandleAdornment is a sphere that can be adorned to a BasePart.
The radius of the sphere adornment.

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.documentation: A light source that emits light directionally in the shape of a cone with a spherical base.

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.Angle.documentation: The angle of which the light is shone from the SpotLight.

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.Face.documentation: Sets the side of the parent that the SpotLight comes from.

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.Range.documentation: The size of the area that the SpotLight will illuminate.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Coil.documentation: The number of coils visualized on the SpringConstraint. This can only be set between 0 and 8.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Curr.documentation: The current distance between the SpringConstantâ€™s Attachment.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Damp.documentation: Damping constant for the SpringConstraint. Multiplied to the velocity of the constraintâ€™s Attachment to reduce the spring force applied.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Free.documentation: Natural resting length of the spring.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Limi.documentation: Sets whether the SpringConstraint enforces a minimum and maximum length.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.MaxF.documentation: The maximum force the SpringConstraint can apply on its Attachment.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.MaxL.documentation: The maximum separation the SpringConstraint will allow if SpringConstraint.LimitsEnabled is true.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.MinL.documentation: The minimum separation the SpringConstraint will allow if SpringConstraint.LimitsEnabled is true.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Radi.documentation: The visualized radius of the spring's coils.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Stif.documentation: The strength of the spring. The higher this value the more force will be applied when the attachments are separated a different length than the SpringConstraint.FreeLength.

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Thic.documentation: The visualized thickness of the spring's coils.

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGear.documentation: If the game allows gear, StarterGear contains all of a player's appropriate gear. Whenever the Player's character spawns, all of the contents of that player's StarterGear will get copied into the player's Backpack.

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.ResetPlaye.documentation: Determines whether each child parented to the StarterGui will be cloned into a player's PlayerGui when that player's character is respawned.

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPack.documentation: Un conteneur de niveau de service dont le contenu est copié dans chaque Player Backpack quand ilplayer apparaît. Il est généralement utilisé pour contenir Tools, mais est parfois utilisé pour contenir LocalScripts pour s'assurer que chacunplayer reçoit un copie.
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPack.code_sample:
local StarterPack = game:GetService("StarterPack")

local function emptyStarterPack()
	for _, child in pairs(StarterPack:GetChildren()) do
		if child:IsA("Tool") then
			child:Destroy()
		end
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.documentation: Un service qui autorise les valeurs par défaut des propriétés de l'objet Player ensemble.
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local playername = "polarpanda16"
local player = Players:WaitForChild(playername)

local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Parent = game.Workspace
part.Name = "ReplicationFocusPart"
part.Anchored = true

player.ReplicationFocus = part

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.AllowCu.documentation:
Décrit les niveaux d'autorisation du jeu actuel concernant l'avatar personnalisé
animations du site Web.

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.AutoJum.documentation:
Définit si le personnage sautera automatiquement lorsqu'il touche un
obstacle sur un appareil mobile.
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.AutoJum.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local button = script.Parent

local function update()
	-- Update button text
	if player.AutoJumpEnabled then
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is ON"
	else
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is OFF"
	end
	-- Reflect the property in the player's character, if they have one
	if player.Character then
		local human = player.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if human then
			human.AutoJumpEnabled = player.AutoJumpEnabled
		end
	end
end

local function onActivated()
	-- Toggle auto-jump
	player.AutoJumpEnabled = not player.AutoJumpEnabled
	-- Update everything else
	update()
end
button.Activated:Connect(onActivated)
update()

La distance maximale autorisée parplayer la caméra par défaut à effectuer un zoom arrière
clous.

Détermine le démarragevalue de « Humanoid/JumpPower » pour Joueur.Personnage.
Détermine l'état de départ de Humanoid.UseJumpPower pour Joueur.Personnage.

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevCame.documentation:

playerse trouve sur un ordinateur.

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevTouc.documentation:

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevTouc.code_sample:

-- Set the player's movement mode on mobile devices to a virtual thumbstick

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.EnableM.documentation: Détermine si le verrouillage de la sourisplayer peut être activé par défaut.
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.EnableM.code_sample:

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.ContactsCount.documentation: A measurement of how many parts are currently in contact with one another.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.DataReceiveKbps.documentation: In a networked game, this describes roughly how many kilobytes of data are being received by the current instance, per second.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.DataSendKbps.documentation: In a networked game, this describes roughly how many kilobytes of data are being sent by the current instance, per second.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.HeartbeatTimeMs.documentation: A measurement of the total amount of time it takes long it takes for Roblox to update all of its Task Scheduler jobs, in milliseconds.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.InstanceCount.documentation: A measurement of how many Instance are currently in memory.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.MovingPrimitive.documentation: A measurement of how many physically simulated components are currently moving in the game world.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.PhysicsReceiveK.documentation: In a networked game, this describes roughly how many kilobytes of physics data are being received by the current instance, per second.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.PhysicsSendKbps.documentation: In a networked game, this describes roughly how many kilobytes of physics data are being sent by the current instance, per second.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.PhysicsStepTime.documentation:
A measurement of how long it takes for the physics engine to update its current state, in milliseconds.
If this value is high, then it means the game instance is under stress from the physics simulations taking place.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.PrimitivesCount.documentation: A measurement of how many physically simulated components currently exist in the game world.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.GetMemoryUsageM.documentation: Returns the number of megabytes that are being consumed in the specified DeveloperMemoryTag category.

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.GetTotalMemoryU.documentation: Returns the total amount of memory being consumed by the current game session, in megabytes.

@roblox/globaltype/StatsItem.GetValueStr.documentation: Renvoie le «StatsItem s »value sous forme de chaîne formatée.

@roblox/globaltype/Status.documentation: An unfinished object which offers no functionality to developers.

@roblox/globaltype/StringValue.documentation: A container object for a single string.
@roblox/globaltype/StringValue.code_sample:
-- Demonstrate the Changed event by creating a Part
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Changed:Connect(print)
-- This fires Changed with "Transparency"
part.Transparency = .5
-- Similarly, this fires Changed with "Number"
part.Name = "SomePart"
-- Since changing BrickColor will also change other
-- properties at the same time, this line fires Changed
-- with "BrickColor", "Color3" and "Color3uint16".
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.Red()

-- A NumberValue holds a double-precision floating-point number 
local vNumber = Instance.new("NumberValue")
vNumber.Changed:Connect(print)
-- This fires Changed with 123.456 (not "Value")
vNumber.Value = 123.456
-- This does not fire Changed
vNumber.Name = "SomeNumber"

-- A StringValue stores one string
local vString = Instance.new("StringValue")
vString.Changed:Connect(print)
-- This fires Changed with "Hello" (not "Value")
vString.Value = "Hello"

@roblox/globaltype/StringValue.Value.documentation: The stored string.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Always Save Sc.documentation: If set to true, Roblox Studio will attempt to transfer script changes that were made during a Play Solo session to the opened place.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Animate Hover.documentation: If set to true, the hover selection box that is shown when mousing over selectable objects in the Workspace will flash between Studio/Hover Over Color and Studio/Select Color based on the Studio/Hover Animate Speed.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Built-in Funct.documentation: Sets the color of built-in functions and keywords in the script editor.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Camera Mouse W.documentation: Sets how many studs the camera will move forward or backwards when using the mouse wheel.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Camera Shift S.documentation: Sets the speed in studs/sec that the camera moves while holding down Shift with the movement keys.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Camera Speed.documentation: Sets the speed in studs/sec that the camera moves when movement keys are pressed.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Clear Output O.documentation: If set to true, the output will be automatically cleared when game sessions are switched.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Comment Color.documentation: Specifies the color of comments in Roblox Studio's script editor.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.DefaultScriptF.documentation: Specifies the default prompt directory that will be opened when the user activates the Execute Script button in Roblox Studio.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.DeprecatedObje.documentation: If set to true, deprecated objects will be shown in the Advanced Objects window, as well as the Object Browser.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Drag Multiple.documentation:
If set to true, the bounding box of a selection will be used for collision detection while dragging, instead of each individual part being checked.
This makes the dragger perform smoother, but with notably less precision.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Enable Autocom.documentation: When set to true, the script editor and command bar will show an autocomplete menu while writing.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Error Color.documentation: Specifies the color of the wavy underline shown when malformed code is detected in the script editor.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Find Selection.documentation: Sets the highlight color of matches in the script editor's Find Selection operation (Ctrl+F).

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Font.documentation: Specifies the font used in the script editor.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Hover Animate.documentation: Specifies how frequently the hover animation flashes when the mouse is hovering over a selectable object in the Workspace.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Hover Over Col.documentation: Specifies the color that the hover selection box uses.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Keyword Color.documentation: Sets the text color of built-in Lua keywords.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Line Thickness.documentation: Sets the thickness of the Model.PrimaryPart selection adornee. This value is constrained between 0 and 0.05

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.LuaDebuggerEna.documentation: Specifies whether or not the Lua Debugger feature is enabled.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Matching Word.documentation: Sets the highlight color of double-clicked variables in the script editor.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Maximum Output.documentation: The maximum number of lines that can be displayed in the output.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Number Color.documentation: Specifies the color of numbers in Roblox Studio's script editor.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Only Play Audi.documentation: If set to true, audio being played will only be heard if the game window is being focused on.
@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Only Play Audi.learn_more_link: https://developer.roblox.com/api-reference/property/Studio/Only Play Audio from Window in Focus

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Operator Color.documentation: Sets the text color of operator characters in the script editor.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Output Font.documentation: Specifies the font used by the output.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Output Layout.documentation: Sets the layout mode of the output.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.OverrideCoreSc.documentation: If set to true, the Studio.OverrideCoreScriptsDir will be used for CoreScripts in Roblox Studio, instead of the default rbxasset://scripts directory.
The directory used when overriding core scripts. This should point to a clone of Roblox's CoreScript GitHub repository.

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Render Throttl.documentation:
Scales how much rendering will be throttled when the game window isn't being focused on.

Returns the studio user’s userId if they're logged in, otherwise returns 0.
@roblox/globaltype/StudioService.GetUser.code_sample:
-- Can only be used in a plugin
local StudioService = game:GetService("StudioService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local loggedInUserName = Players:GetNameFromUserIdAsync(loggedInUserId)

local part = Instance.new("Part")

-- Create a new SurfaceLight

@roblox/globaltype/Team.documentation: La classeTeam ` représente une faction dans un lieu Roblox. Le seul parent valide for aTeam est dans le serviceTeams`.

@roblox/globaltype/Team.AutoAssignable.documentation: Cette propriété détermine si Players sera automatiquement placé sur leTeam `lors de la jointure. Si plusieurs équipes ont cette propriété définie sur C'est vrai, Roblox tentera d'égaliser les équipes lorsque desPlayer`s seront ajoutés.

@roblox/globaltype/Team.AutoColorCharact.documentation: Obsolète et ne fonctionne plus. Définit historiquement si oui ou non Les modèles de personnages Player d'une équipe seraient colorés en Team.TeamColor.

@roblox/globaltype/Team.Score.documentation:
Obsolète. Cette propriété peut être utilisée pour stocker une valeur entière associée
avec l'équipe. Cette propriété n'offre aucune fonctionnalité supplémentaire et n'est pas
utilisé par tous les services de jeu.

@roblox/globaltype/Team.TeamColor.documentation: Cette propriété définit la couleur du Team. Détermine le Propriété Player.TeamColor des joueurs membres de l'équipe. Aussi détermine la couleur affichée dans laplayer liste et au-dessusplayer têtes.
@roblox/globaltype/Team.TeamColor.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local door = Instance.new("Part")
door.Anchored = true 
door.Size = Vector3.new(7, 10, 1)
door.Position = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)
door.Parent = game.Workspace

local debounce = false 

door.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
	if not debounce then
		debounce = true
		if hit then
			local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent)
			if player and player.TeamColor == BrickColor.new("Bright red") then
				door.Transparency = 0.5
				door.CanCollide = false 
				wait(3)
				door.Transparency = 0
				door.CanCollide = true
			end
		end
		wait(0.5)
		debounce = false
	end
end)

-- count how many players are on each team

    print("Team " .. team.Name .. " has " .. #players .. " players")
end

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.GetAr.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedFirst = game:GetService("ReplicatedFirst")

local customLoadingScreen = TeleportService:GetArrivingTeleportGui()
if customLoadingScreen then
    local playerGui = Players.LocalPlayer:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")
    ReplicatedFirst:RemoveDefaultLoadingScreen()
    customLoadingScreen.Parent = playerGui
    -- animate screen here
    wait(5)
    -- destroy screen
    customLoadingScreen:Destroy()
end

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.code_sample:
local TS = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local DSS = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local DS = DSS:GetGlobalDataStore()
 
-- Get the saved code
local code = DS:GetAsync("ReservedServer")
if type(code) ~= "string" then -- None saved, create one
	code = TS:ReserveServer(game.PlaceId)
	DS:SetAsync("ReservedServer",code)
end
 
local function Joined(plr)
	-- Everytime they chat, we want to know
	plr.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
		if msg == "reserved" then -- Aha, that's our cue
			TS:TeleportToPrivateServer(game.PlaceId,code,{plr})
		end
	end)
end
 
-- Connect all current and future players
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(Joined)
for k,v in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	Joined(v)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")

local placeId = 0 -- replace
local playerList = Players:GetPlayers()

local success, result = pcall(function()
    return TeleportService:TeleportPartyAsync(placeId, playerList)
end)

if success then
    local jobId = result
    print("Players teleported to "..jobId)
else
    warn(result)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.documentation:
Service utilisé par Roblox pour effectuer des tests contrôlés du moteur. C'est
disponible pour les développeurs, dans une certaine mesure.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.AutoRuns.documentation: Si défini sur true, le jeu commencera à s'exécuter lorsqueTestService le La méthode TestService:Run est appelée.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Descripti.documentation: Une description du test en cours d'exécution.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.ErrorCoun.documentation: Mesure le nombre d'erreurs enregistrées lors de la session de test.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.ExecuteWi.documentation: Lorsqu'il est défini sur true, leTestService sera exécuté lors de l'utilisation du Run action dans RobloxStudio.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Is30FpsTh.documentation:
Définit si le moteur physique doit être limité à 30 FPS pendant que
le test est en cours.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.IsPhysics.documentation:
Définit si l'environnement physique doit être limité ou non pendant
exécution de ce test.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.IsSleepAl.documentation:
Définit si les objets physiques seront autorisés à s'endormir pendant
la simulation de test est en cours.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.NumberOfP.documentation: Le nombre de personnesplayers attendues dans ce test, le cas échéant.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.SimulateS.documentation:
Définit une quantité spécifique de latence supplémentaire subie parplayers pendant
la session de test.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.TestCount.documentation: Mesure le nombre d'appels de test enregistrés au cours de la session de test.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.Timeout.documentation: Durée maximale pendant laquelle les tests peuvent être exécutés.

@roblox/globaltype/TestService.WarnCount.documentation: Mesure le nombre d'appels d'avertissement enregistrés au cours de la session de test.

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.documentation: Élément d'interface utilisateur 2D qui affiche du texteplayer modifiable.

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.ClearTextOnFo.documentation: Détermine si un clic sur le boutonTextBox effacera sonTextBox Text propriété.

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.CursorPositio.documentation:
Détermine le décalage du curseur de texte en octets, ou -1 s'il n'y a pas
curseur.
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.CursorPositio.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function showSelection()
	if textBox.CursorPosition == -1 or textBox.SelectionStart == -1 then
		print("No selection")
	else
		local selectedText = string.sub(
			textBox.Text,
			math.min(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart),
			math.max(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart)
		)
		print("The selection is: \"" .. selectedText .. "\"")
	end
end

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("CursorPosition"):Connect(showSelection)
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("SelectionStart"):Connect(showSelection)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.Font.documentation: Détermine la police utilisée pour le rendu du texte.
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.Font.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

while true do
	-- Iterate over all the different fonts
	for i, font in pairs(Enum.Font:GetEnumItems()) do
		textLabel.Font = font
		textLabel.Text = font.Name
		wait(1)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.FontFace.documentation: Détermine la police utilisée pour le rendu du texte.

Lorsqu'ilTextBox est défini sur true, le texte à l'intérieur de a peut être déplacé sur plusieurs
lignes. Cela permet égalementplayers d'utiliser la touche Entrée pour passer à un nouveau
ligne.

Détermine la position de départ d'une sélection de texte, ou -1 si aucun texte n'est
sélectionné.
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.SelectionStar.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function showSelection()
	if textBox.CursorPosition == -1 or textBox.SelectionStart == -1 then
		print("No selection")
	else
		local selectedText = string.sub(
			textBox.Text,
			math.min(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart),
			math.max(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart)
		)
		print("The selection is: \"" .. selectedText .. "\"")
	end
end

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("CursorPosition"):Connect(showSelection)
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("SelectionStart"):Connect(showSelection)

S'il est défini sur true, l'entrée native de la plate-forme est utilisée à la place de Roblox

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.Text.documentation: Détermine la chaîne rendue par l'élément d'interface utilisateur.

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextBounds.documentation: Le textesize d'un élément d'interface utilisateur en décalages.
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextBounds.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

-- The smallest the TextBox will go
local minWidth, minHeight = 10, 10

-- Set alignment so our text doesn't wobble a bit while we type
textBox.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Left
textBox.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top

local function updateSize()
	textBox.Size = UDim2.new(
		0, math.max(minWidth, textBox.TextBounds.X),
		0, math.max(minHeight, textBox.TextBounds.Y)
	)
end

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("TextBounds"):Connect(updateSize)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextColor3.documentation: Détermine la couleur du texte rendu.
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextColor3.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function hasVowels(str)
	return str:lower():find("[aeiou]")
end

local function onTextChanged()
	local text = textBox.Text
	-- Check for vowels
	if hasVowels(text) then
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- Black
	else
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- Red
	end
end
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Text"):Connect(onTextChanged)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextEditable.documentation:
Détermine si l'utilisateur peut modifier le «

TextBox .Text |Text ».

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextFits.documentation: Si le texte s'inscrit dans les contraintes duTextBox.

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextScaled.documentation: Indique si le texte est redimensionné pour s'adapter à l'objet GUI qui le rend.

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextSize.documentation: Déterminez la ligneheight de texte en décalages.
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextSize.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

textLabel.Text = "Kaboom!"

while true do
	for size = 5, 100, 5 do
		textLabel.TextSize = size
		textLabel.TextTransparency = size / 100
		wait()
	end
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextStrokeCol.documentation: Détermine la couleur du contour du texte (contour).
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextStrokeCol.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- How fast the highlight ought to blink
local freq = 2

-- Set to yellow highlight color
textLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0)

while true do
	-- math.sin oscillates from -1 to 1, so we change the range to 0 to 1:
	local transparency = math.sin(workspace.DistributedGameTime*math.pi*freq)*.5+.5
	textLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = transparency
	wait()
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextXAlignmen.documentation: Détermine l'alignement horizontal du texte rendu.
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextXAlignmen.code_sample:
-- Paste this in a LocalScript within a TextLabel/TextButton/TextBox
local textLabel = script.Parent

local function setAlignment(xAlign, yAlign)
	textLabel.TextXAlignment = xAlign
	textLabel.TextYAlignment = yAlign
	textLabel.Text = xAlign.Name .. " + " .. yAlign.Name
end

while true do
	-- Iterate over both TextXAlignment and TextYAlignment enum items
	for j, yAlign in pairs(Enum.TextYAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
		for i, xAlign in pairs(Enum.TextXAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
			setAlignment(xAlign, yAlign)
			wait(1)
		end
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextButton.code_sample:
-- Place this code in a LocalScript in a TextButton
local textButton = script.Parent

-- Initialize the state of the button
local counter = 0
textButton.Text = "Click me!"

-- Here, we define a function that increments the counter
-- and updates the button text after doing so
local function onActivated()
	counter = counter + 1
	textButton.Text = "Clicks: " .. counter
end

-- Connect the "Activated" event to our function
textButton.Activated:Connect(onActivated)

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.documentation: Élément d'interface utilisateur 2D qui affiche du texte non interactif.
@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.code_sample:
-- Place this code in a LocalScript within a TextLabel/TextButton
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- Some colors we'll use with TextColor3
local colorNormal = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- black
local colorSoon = Color3.new(1, .5, .5) -- red
local colorDone = Color3.new(.5, 1, .5) -- green

-- Loop infinitely
while true do
	-- Count backwards from 10 to 1
	for i = 10, 1, -1 do
		-- Set the text
		textLabel.Text = "Time: " .. i
		-- Set the color based on how much time is left
		if i > 3 then
			textLabel.TextColor3 = colorNormal
		else
			textLabel.TextColor3 = colorSoon
		end
		wait(1)
	end
	textLabel.Text = "GO!"
	textLabel.TextColor3 = colorDone
	wait(2)
end

while true do

	for i, font in pairs(Enum.Font:GetEnumItems()) do
		textLabel.Font = font
		textLabel.Text = font.Name
		wait(1)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextBounds.documentation: Le textesize d'un élément d'interface utilisateur en décalages.
@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextBounds.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

-- The smallest the TextBox will go
local minWidth, minHeight = 10, 10

-- Set alignment so our text doesn't wobble a bit while we type
textBox.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Left
textBox.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top

local function updateSize()
	textBox.Size = UDim2.new(
		0, math.max(minWidth, textBox.TextBounds.X),
		0, math.max(minHeight, textBox.TextBounds.Y)
	)
end

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("TextBounds"):Connect(updateSize)

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextColor3.documentation: Cette propriété détermine la couleur du texte rendu.
@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextColor3.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function hasVowels(str)
	return str:lower():find("[aeiou]")
end

local function onTextChanged()
	local text = textBox.Text
	-- Check for vowels
	if hasVowels(text) then
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- Black
	else
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- Red
	end
end
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Text"):Connect(onTextChanged)

textLabel.Text = "Kaboom!"

while true do
	for size = 5, 100, 5 do
		textLabel.TextSize = size
		textLabel.TextTransparency = size / 100
		wait()
	end
	wait(1)

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextStrokeC.documentation: Détermine la couleur du contour du texte (contour).
@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextStrokeC.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- How fast the highlight ought to blink
local freq = 2

-- Set to yellow highlight color
textLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0)

while true do
	-- math.sin oscillates from -1 to 1, so we change the range to 0 to 1:
	local transparency = math.sin(workspace.DistributedGameTime*math.pi*freq)*.5+.5
	textLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = transparency
	wait()
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextXAlignm.documentation: Détermine l'alignement horizontal du texte rendu.
@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.TextXAlignm.code_sample:
-- Paste this in a LocalScript within a TextLabel/TextButton/TextBox
local textLabel = script.Parent

local function setAlignment(xAlign, yAlign)
	textLabel.TextXAlignment = xAlign
	textLabel.TextYAlignment = yAlign
	textLabel.Text = xAlign.Name .. " + " .. yAlign.Name
end

while true do
	-- Iterate over both TextXAlignment and TextYAlignment enum items
	for j, yAlign in pairs(Enum.TextYAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
		for i, xAlign in pairs(Enum.TextXAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
			setAlignment(xAlign, yAlign)
			wait(1)
		end
	end
end

local TextService = game:GetService("TextService")

local function getTextBounds(...)
	local message = "Hello World"

    local bounds = TextService:GetTextSize(message, 12, "SourceSans", size)
    return bounds + Vector2.new(1, 1)
end

print(getTextBounds())

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.documentation: Un objet, tel qu'une arme, qui peut être équipé d'unHumanoid ``.
@roblox/globaltype/Tool.code_sample:
local tool = script.Parent
    
    local function explode(point)
    	local e = Instance.new("Explosion")
    	e.DestroyJointRadiusPercent = 0 -- Make the explosion non-deadly 
    	e.Position = point
    	e.Parent = workspace
    end
    
    local function onActivated()
    	-- Get the Humanoid that Activated the tool
    	local human = tool.Parent.Humanoid
    	-- Call explode with the current point the Humanoid is targetting
    	explode(human.TargetPoint) 
    end
    
    tool.Activated:Connect(onActivated)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.CanBeDropped.code_sample:
local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.Name = "I AM CAT"
tool.RequiresHandle = false
tool.CanBeDropped = false
tool.Parent = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Backpack

tool.Activated:Connect(function()
	print("Meow")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Enabled.documentation: Détermine si letool peut être utilisé ou non.
@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Enabled.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character
local humanoid = character.Humanoid

local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.Name = "SuperJump"
tool.RequiresHandle = false
tool.Parent = player.Backpack

local invisible = false

function toolActivated()
	humanoid.JumpPower = 150
	tool.Enabled = false
	wait(5)
	tool.Enabled = true
	humanoid.JumpPower = 50
end

tool.Activated:Connect(toolActivated)
tool.Unequipped:Connect(function() humanoid.JumpPower = 50 end)

handle.Name = "Handle"
handle.Parent = tool
handle.Size = Vector3.new(.1,3,.1)
handle.Color = Color3.new(108, 88, 75) -- Brown

tool.Activated:Connect(function()

	print(tool.GripRight)
	print(tool.GripForward)
	print(tool.GripPos)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.ManualActivation.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character
local humanoid = character.Humanoid

local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.Name = "Sprint"
tool.RequiresHandle = false
tool.Parent = player.Backpack

local invisible = false

	humanoid.WalkSpeed = 30
	tool.ManualActivationOnly = true
	wait(5)
	tool.ManualActivationOnly = false
	humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
end

tool.Activated:Connect(toolActivated)
tool.Unequipped:Connect(function() humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Deactivate.code_sample:
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")
local tool = script.Parent
 
-- Gives Handle within Tool a random BrickColor
local function toolDeactivated()
	tool.Handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random()
end
 
-- Deactivates the tool when any key is pressed down
local function keyPressed(actionName, actionInputState, actionInputObject)	
	if actionInputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then
		tool:Deactivate()
	end
end
 
tool.Deactivated:Connect(toolDeactivated)
ContextActionService:BindAction("deactivateTool", keyPressed, true, "x")

@roblox/globaltype/TouchTransmitter.code_sample:
local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Anchored = true 
    part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)
    part.Parent = workspace
    
    part.Touched:Connect(function()
    	print("part touched!")
    end)
    
    local touchTransmitter = part:WaitForChild("TouchInterest")
    if touchTransmitter then
    	print("removing TouchTransmitter!")
    	touchTransmitter:Destroy()
    end
